snippet.title: Daedalus Versus Minotaur - Gameplay (Playdate)
snippet.description:
An asymmetric multiplayer maze game of fast-paced building and solving!

- Asymmetric multiplayer on the Playdate! Alternate between building and solving mazes in the two player hotseat versus mode.
- Escape from randomly generated mazes in an additional singleplayer mode accessible in the paid supporter's edition!
- A Pulp first? Full screen 3D first-person gameplay!
- Fast paced rounds lasting 10 to 90 seconds! Find your balance with separately adjustable build and solve times.

https://orangethiefgames.itch.io/daedalus-versus-minotaur

https://orangethief.co.uk
https://mastodon.social/@OrangeThief
